purpose: To provide a curated collection of libraries and tools for engineers working with large language models (LLMs)
principle: Compiles and categorizes various LLM libraries to streamline development and experimentation
reusability: Offers a categorized repository of libraries that can be easily referenced and integrated into LLM projects
limitations: Primarily acts as a reference list; does not include implementations or code examples
name: llm-engineer-toolkit
description: A curated list of  120+ LLM libraries category wise.
highlight: Comprehensive list of 120+ LLM libraries organized by category
